org.webcurator.core.profiles
Class HeritrixProfile

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.core.profiles.HeritrixProfile

public class HeritrixProfile
extends java.lang.Object

The HeritrixProfile class wraps the Heritrix XMLSettingsHandler and CrawlerSettings object to allow the WCT a degree of separation from the Heritrix implementation. Despite this degree of separation, there is still a close relationship between Heritrix and the WCT.

Author:
bbeaumont

removeFromMapByType

public void removeFromMapByType(java.lang.String complexElementName,
                                java.lang.String type)
Remove items from a map if they are of the given type. This is used to remove overridden filters from the Heritrix profile before applying the overrides.

Parameters:
complexElementName - The name of the map.
type - The classname of the type of object to remove.

getOptionsForType

public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getOptionsForType(java.lang.Class type)
Get the valid options for a given type. This is used for Filters etc. where the Profile Editor will provide a list of acceptable classnames.

Parameters:
type - The class to get the options from.
Returns:
A list of legal options.

setAllSimpleTypes

public void setAllSimpleTypes(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                              ComplexProfileElement element)
Given the attributes in the request, attempt to set all the simple types, including lists (which aren't technically simple, but are close enough). The element passed in serves as the root of the recursion. This method will set all the simple children of the element, and then recurse to set all the simple children of this element's children (and so on).

Parameters:
request - The HttpServletRequest to get the attributes from.
element - The complex element from which to start setting the values.

create

public static HeritrixProfile create()
Create a base profile. This profile is created from the default-profile.xml file in the root of the classpath. To customise the base profile, edit this file and restart the web application.

Returns:
A new base profile.
